name: presentation-css
description: The Augmented.js Next - Presentation SASS/CSS Module.

scripts.sass: node-sass src/styles/material-generic.scss > src/styles/material-generic.css && node-sass src/styles/dark/darkmode.scss > src/styles/dark/darkmode.css

author: Bob Warren <jedi.master@augmentedjs.com> (http://www.augmentedjs.com)
